ygData.subject: Re: Faction troubles
ygData.msgSnippet: There is also a Dark Elf Rogue in West Freeport near the zone to North Freeport (which zone bank is in) that hides in the corner (at night) and jumps out and
ygData.messageBody:
There is also a Dark Elf Rogue in West Freeport near the zone to North
Freeport (which zone bank is in) that hides in the corner (at night) and
jumps out and backstabs you. It got my Halfling buddy good.


-----Original Message-----
From: Hapke, Matthew [mailto:mahapke@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 2:19 PM
To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqenchanters] Faction troubles


From: "Hapke, Matthew" <mahapke@...>

Just a warning to those folks in the qeynos area. There is a Dark Elf
rogue that ppears in the newbie zone at night there that is blue to lvl
12 folks. Seems like the right thing to do to get rid of this guy,
right? Dark Elf, Rogue, night, hehe. when killed however, this guy
lowers your faction stance with the Guards and merchants of High Hold!
Not sure how bad, cause I havent gone back to the keep yet, but I am
sure it wont be good.
